recipes.title: Vodka Pasta
recipes.description: For when you're in a creamy pasta mood.
instructions: boil water + cook pasta (save pasta water)
in a sauce pan, over medium heat, add olive oil
add minced onion, garlic, and pinch of salt, cook until softened
pour in tomato paste, red pepper flakes and cook til dark red color
add vodka and let sizzle
pour in heavy cream and mix til smooth
add in cooked pasta into the sauce and pasta water if necessary

recipes.title: Gochujang Pasta
recipes.description: Feeling a lil spice and craving pasta.
instructions: boil water + cook pasta (save pasta water)
drizzle olive oil on cooked pasta
in a pot, add in oil (olive or avocado) over medium heat. once it starts to sizzle, add minced garlic and stir until fragrant. add gochujang pasta and stir until it darkens/caramelizes a little.
add heavy cream, and some pasta water. stir in until creamy and smooth.
season with salt, black pepper, paprika
bring to gentle boil then add cooked pasta

recipes.title: Protein & Spinach Pasta
recipes.description: Meet the macros, switch out protein of choice (chicken, beef, shrimp).
instructions: boil water + cook pasta (save pasta water)
drizzle olive oil on cooked pasta (prevents sticking)
season the chicken with spices and put in air fryer
in a pan, add onions, garlic and cook til lightly browned and fragrant.
stir in spinach, cooked chicken and pasta

recipes.title: Spaghetti and Meatballs
instructions: boil water + cook spaghetti (save pasta water)
combine bread pieces with water, set aside for 5 minutes then mash with a fork
meatball mixture: in a large bowl add ground beef, parmesan, garlic, salt & pepper, egg, and mashed bread crumbs. mix until well combined
for the sauce: over medium heat, add oil and onion until soft and golden, stir in garlic until fragrant
stir in crushed tomatoes and bay leaves, bring to light boil
add meatballs into sauce and simmer gently for 30 min
5 minutes before sauce is done, stir in chopped basil and season with salt and pepper

recipes.title: Pesto Pasta
instructions: boil water + cook pasta (save pasta water)
drizzle olive oil on cooked pasta
in a skillet over low heat, add pesto, pasta water and stir to combine
add pasta and stir until evenly coated, add more pasta water if necessary
turn off heat and add lemon juice, salt, pepper to taste
add arugula and garnish with red pepper flakes and pine nuts

recipes.title: Spicy Tofu Stew
ingredients: baby bok choy or other veggies
instructions: add sesame oil, garlic, white onion to medium-sized pot over medium-high heat and sauté until fragrant
add the whites of the onions to the pan and continue to sauté for five to seven minutes
sprinkle in the chili flakes and beef broth powder, then stir in the soup base liquid and bring to a boil
add in proteins, veggies, tofu
crack egg into soup and garnish with green onions

recipes.title: Chia Pudding
instructions: add in all ingredients and let it sit overnight in the fridge
once mixture thickens, add in greek yogurt
top with fruits, coconut flakes, hemp seeds, etc.

recipes.title: Cheesecake
instructions: preheat oven to 320 Fahrenheit
crush graham cracker into very fine bits and pour melted butter in and mix
scoop into a tray and set aside
whisk cream cheese until creamy on low speed
add sugar bit by bit until combined
add egg one by one
add vanilla extract, flour, sour cream and mix
scoop into base and bake for 15 minutes (check by shaking gently and see if they wiggle then the center is almost set)
leave to cool completely then chill in fridge overnight

recipes.title: Vegan Chocolate Chip Cookies
instructions: preheat oven to 350 Fahrenheit
in a mixer, add both sugar, coconut oil, and salt, mix til combine
add in milk, vanilla extract and stir til everything is smooth
sift in flour, baking soda, cornstarch, chocolate chips and fold carefully
chill in fridge (the longer the better)
scoop into tray and bake for 17 minutes

recipes.title: Chocolate Chip Banana Bread
instructions: preheat oven to 350 Fahrenheit and grease loaf pan
in a mixer, puree bananas and stir in coconut oil, vanilla extract, egg, brown sugar
stir in flour, salt, cinnamon, baking soda and fold in chocolate chips and walnuts
bake for 50 minutes and test with toothpick

recipes.title: Nui Soup
ingredients: 1.75 lbs meaty pork ribs (separated into individual ribs)
9-10 oz carrots, peeled and divided (about 2 medium to large carrots)
9-10 oz daikon radish, peeled and divided
6-8 oz your choice of short pasta
instructions: parboil pork ribs in boiling water
in big pot, add water, ginger, salt, pork ribs and bring to a boil then lower to a simmer (skim off foam)
cover pot with lid and simmer for 60-75 minutes
add veggies to soup
cook pasta noodles
taste soup and season to liking
add everything together once done and garnish with scallion, cilantro

recipes.title: Matcha Latte
instructions: sift in matcha into cup
add water and whisk in m motion
add in honey
grab cup filled with ice and fill with milk
add in matcha mixture, and stir

recipes.title: Stir-fried Fish Cake
instructions: bring medium pot of water to a boil
plunge fish cake for 30 seconds, drain and cool
cut fish cake into sizable pieces and thinly slice veggies
heat non-stick pan and add garlic, onions, scallions and cook for a minute
add fish cake and chili peppers, stir fry for about a minute
add sauce ingredients over fish cake and veggies

recipes.title: Hot Honey Ground Beef Bowl
ingredients: 1 1/2 pound sweet potato, diced into small cubes
instructions: preheat oven to 425F
season sweet potatoes and bake for 30 min, flipping occasionally
in frying pan on medium high heat, add ground beef and cook for five min
add tomato paste, taco seasoning, splash of water and cook for 1-2 min
add everything together and drizzle hot honey

recipes.title: Ground Turkey Spaghetti Squash Boats
recipes.description: Healthy and delicious, packed with protein and fiber.
instructions: preheat oven to 400F
cut squash in half, remove seeds
drizzle olive oil and season with salt and pepper
place face down and poke with a fork, bake for 30 minutes
in large skillet over medium high heat, add olive oil and turkey
cook turkey and season
add tomato paste, marinara sauce, diced tomatoes, basil, oregano, thyme, red pepper flakes and stir and let simmer for 10-20 minutes
after squash is done baking, let cool slightly shred with forks
fill with sauce and top with basil

recipes.title: Snicker Dates
recipes.description: For when you're craving a sweet treat.
instructions: spread peanut butter into middle of each date
melt chocolate and dup each dare into chocolate
finish with pinch of sea salt
transfer to freezer to harden chocolate

recipes.title: Ground Beef Taco Bowls
instructions: in large skillet over medium, saute ground beef then add in tomato paste
mix in taco seasoning and water, reduce heat to low and let simmer
in another skillet, add onions and saute for 5-7 minutes
assemble bowl

recipes.title: Spicy Korean Gochujang Noddles
instructions: cook noodles
in large skillet, saute ground beef
in a bowl, whisk together all ingredients and set aside for the sauce
add in half the sauce to noodles and mix well
add in ground meet beef and rest of sauce
garnish with scallions, sesame seeds, cilantro and red pepper flakes

recipes.title: Ground Turkey Bowl
ingredients: dash of cayenne pepper and salt
instructions: whisk apple cider vinegar, honey, salt, water
place red onion, garlic in mason jar and pour vinegar mixture and let sit for 1 hour
preheat oven to 425F, season and bake sweet potatoes for 25-30 minutes
in a pan over medium heat, add ground turkey and add chili powder, smoked paprika, tumeric to season
add kale to a bowl with olive oil, salt, lemon juice and massage for a few minutes
for peanut sauce, add pb2 and water in a bowl, forming a peanut butter paste
add remaining ingredients to bowl and mix well
assemble bowl with all ingredients!

recipes.title: Viet Sweet and Sour Soup
ingredients: 2 stalks of lemongrass, with the ends bruised
5-8 springs of rice paddy herb (ngo om), chopped
instructions: in a big pot, heat up oil over medium heat
add minced garlic, thai chilis, lemongrass and saute until garlic begins to change color
add tamarind concentrate, fish sauce, sugar and mix well until it comes to a boil
add 6 cups of water, tomatoes, pineapples, turn heat to high, bring to a boil
lower heat to medium low, cover and simmer for 10 minutes
add in catfish and bring back to boil
add in bean sprouts and it's ready to eat!

recipes.title: Vegan Pasta
ingredients: 2 stalks of lemongrass, with the ends bruised
5-8 springs of rice paddy herb (ngo om), chopped
instructions: in a big pot, heat up oil over medium heat
add minced garlic, thai chilis, lemongrass and saute until garlic begins to change color
add tamarind concentrate, fish sauce, sugar and mix well until it comes to a boil
add 6 cups of water, tomatoes, pineapples, turn heat to high, bring to a boil
lower heat to medium low, cover and simmer for 10 minutes
add in catfish and bring back to boil
add in bean sprouts and it's ready to eat!

recipes.title: Carrot Cake Cupcakes
instructions: preheat the oven to 400°F and line muffin tin with cupcake liners.
in a medium bowl, whisk together the flour, baking powder, cinnamon, salt, baking soda, ginger, and nutmeg
in a large bowl, whisk together the brown sugar, cane sugar, vegetable oil, eggs, milk, and vanilla. Stir in the carrots
pour the dry ingredients into the wet ingredients and mix until just combined. Use a ⅓-cup measuring cup to scoop the batter into the muffin cups

bake for 16 to 20 minutes, or until the cupcakes spring back to the touch and a toothpick inserted comes out clean. Let cool in the pan for 10 minutes, and then transfer to a wire rack to cool completely
once cool, decorate the cupcakes with cream cheese frosting and crushed pecans

recipes.title: Air Fryer Baked Sweet Potato
instructions: preheat the oven to 400°F
use a fork to poke holes in the sweet potatoes
set them in the air fryer basket and air fry for 40 to 55 minutes, or until puffed up and soft inside when pierced with a fork.
slice open each potato, fluff the insides, and serve topped with salt, pepper, and other toppings

recipes.title: Caprese Salad
instructions: on large plate, layer mozzarella and tomato slices in alternating pattern
top with basil leaves, drizzle with olive oil, and season with salt and pepper
eat alone or serve with grilled chicken

recipes.title: Ceasar Salad
instructions: for the dressing: in medium bowl whisk together the mayonnaise, olive oil, lemon juice, mustard, garlic, Worcestershire sauce, salt, and several grinds of pepper until smooth. Stir in the cheese and season to taste. If the dressing is too thick, stir in water, 1 teaspoon at a time, until it reaches your desired consistency

place the lettuce in a large bowl. Add half the dressing, croutons, and half the cheese and toss to coat. Add more dressing as desired, tossing until the salad is coated to your liking. Season to taste and top with the remaining croutons, remaining cheese, and several grinds of pepper.

recipes.title: Shrimp Risotto
instructions: prep shrimp risotto, removing head, intestine and shell.Keep aside 4 whole shrimps, cut the rest into 1/2-inch pieces Collect everything in a bowl and leave them in the refrigerator until use.
slice the carrots into 1/2-inch thick pieces 4, cut the onions into wedges 5, and chop the celery into 1/2-inch pieces
collect all the vegetables in a bowl and add a clove of garlic.Heat oil in a pot, add the vegetables and let them brown for a few minutes. Then add the tomato paste and cook for 4-5 minutes.

put the shrimp scraps in the pot and cook for another 5 minutes. Deglaze with brandy. Once all the alcohol has evaporated, pour very cold water until the pot's contents are completely covered. Lower the heat and cook for about 60 minutes.
strain everything through a sieve. Peel and finely chop half an onion
put the rice in the pot, season with salt, and toast for a few minutes. Add the onion, wait another minute, and deglaze with white wine, allowing all the alcohol to evaporate.

cook the rice by moistening it with shrimp stock, adding a ladle each time the previous one is absorbed. Meanwhile, melt the butter in a pan and add the shrimp pieces, season with salt, and sauté for about 3 minutes.
In the same pan, sauté the whole shrimps set aside earlier. When the rice is cooked, turn off the heat, add the shrimp pieces, and the butter
add the parmesan and stir. Plate the risotto, add a whole shrimp on top, and finish with freshly chopped parsley. The shrimp risotto is ready to be served

recipes.title: Chicken Noodle Soup
instructions: add butter, diced celery and carrots to a large stock pot over medium-high heat. Saute for 3 minutes. Add garlic and cook for another 30 seconds.

sdd chicken stock and season the broth with rosemary, thyme, crushed red pepper, and salt (definitely TASTE the broth before adding more salt), and pepper. Taste and add a spoonful of “better than bullion” chicken or chicken bouillon cubes or granules as needed.
bring broth to a boil. Add noodles and cook just until noodles are al dente.
add chicken meat from the rotisserie chicken. Taste the broth again and add more seasonings, if needed.

recipes.title: Thai Chicken Lettuce Wraps
instructions: heat oil in a large skillet over medium. Add chicken, garlic, onions, salt and pepper and cook, stirring occasionally, until chicken is cooked through.
add the carrots, cabbage, and green onions, cooking an additional 4-5 minutes or until vegetables are tender.
in a small bowl, combine the sweet chili sauce, ginger, chunky peanut butter, and soy sauce, and crushed red pepper. Stir until smooth. Add to pan along with chopped cilantro. Stir to coat.

recipes.title: Magnolian Beef
ingredients: 11 oz beef (New York steak or flank steak)
instructions: cut and wash beef, slice into thin slices across the grain
marinate beef
cut veggies: chop onions into 1/4 inch thick slices, chop scallions into 1 inch pieces, mince garlic
make sauce: mix together oyster sauce, light soy sauce, dark soy sauce, chili sauce, sugar, cooking wine
prepare beef for stir fry: add oil to beef and mix, then add cornstarch to crisp beef up
stir fry beef
stir fry veggies
add the garlic, dried chili pepper, onion, and green onion whites, and green and red bell peppers. Fry them for about 1 1/2 minutes, until they're fragrant and cooked through.
add the beef back in and stir fry for about 20 seconds.
then add the sauce and the green parts of the green onion. Stir fry for 30 seconds more, then turn off the heat.

recipes.title: Bo kho (viet beef stew)
ingredients: 1 tablespoon viet beef stew seasoning (for broth)
instructions: clean the meat. Add beef to a large pot and add 1 tbsp salt and enough tap water to barely cover the meat bring to a boil on high heat, and once it hits a boil for 30 seconds, kill the heat, drain, and rinse under running water to clean.
marinate the meat, and let sit for two hours or overnight

preheat a large pot on medium high. When hot, add the oil, let it warm a bit, then add all the garlic and stir to slowly saute until it turns light brown. Then add the paprika an stir until it releases its aroma, about 30 seconds.

add all broth ingredients to the pot except the carrots. Turn the heat to high until it hits a boil, then reduce heat so it maintains a low boil. Cook until the meat is as tender as you'd like it, about 60-90 minutes. Add carrots towards the final 10 minutes so it softens. Discard the cooked onions and star anise pods.
tearing fresh Thai basil onto your plate, taking occasional bites of jalapeno, and dipping a few pieces of meat into the salt, pepper, lemon juice side for variety.
